title: help with font ID
content:
would anyone be able to help me identify the following font:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426112839im_/http:/typophile.com/files/look_us_3929.jpg)

thanks in advance
author: gncalix

comments.content:
you can do a search with the image at myfonts.com/whatthefont ... that should give you something close.

the results are here:

[http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/results?ch%5B0%5D=N&ch%5B1%5D=E&ch%5B...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426112839/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/results?ch%5B0%5D=N&ch%5B1%5D=E&ch%5B2%5D=W&ch%5B3%5D=M&ch%5B4%5D=A&ch%5B5%5D=E&ch%5B6%5D=R&ch%5B7%5D=N&ch%5B8%5D=s&ch%5B9%5D=R&ch%5B10%5D=W&ch%5B11%5D=I&ch%5B12%5D=V&ch%5B13%5D=A&ch%5B14%5D=E&ch%5B15%5D=A&ch%5B16%5D=L&ch%5B17%5D=R&ch%5B18%5D=S&wtfserver=wtf_a_41&id=0007c1fc51d1b50a00032ebf00003093&glyphcount=19&imageid=0&x=99&y=27 "http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/results?ch%5B0%5D=N&ch%5B1%5D=E&ch%5B2%5D=W&ch%5B3%5D=M&ch%5B4%5D=A&ch%5B5%5D=E&ch%5B6%5D=R&ch%5B7%5D=N&ch%5B8%5D=s&ch%5B9%5D=R&ch%5B10%5D=W&ch%5B11%5D=I&ch%5B12%5D=V&ch%5B13%5D=A&ch%5B14%5D=E&ch%5B15%5D=A&ch%5B16%5D=L&ch%5B17%5D=R&ch%5B18%5D=S&wtfserver=wtf\_a\_41&id=0007c1fc51d1b50a00032ebf00003093&glyphcount=19&imageid=0&x=99&y=27")
The above link shows an error but, try taking a look at Helvetica Neue Heavy Condensed and it may have been manually condensed a bit more. That should get you pretty close...
